course.subject: ENVR
course.name: Urban Farming: Business Opportunity and Climate Cure
course.description: This course explores urban farming as an emerging environmental innovation in Hong Kong. We will cover various relevant and basic topics such as: urban farming techniques, environmental impacts, regulatory analysis etc. Students form teams to propose an urban farming operation in Kai Tak District (facilitated by Energizing Kowloon East Office, Development Bureau) and study its feasibility including: business, environmental and community benefits. The course deliverable is a policy paper advocating urban farming in Hong Kong in line with business viability, promoting climate readiness and facilitating urban sustainability in Hong Kong. Site Visits and Guest Lectures augment the reality aspects of the experiential learning course. No pre-requisites but need instructorâ€™s consents.
